fullName.zh: 心沐智康（杭州）科技有限公司

subtitle.zh: AI 赋能 · 数字健康 · 人本关怀
subtitle.en: AI Empowerment · Digital Health · Human Care

description.zh: 心沐智康致力于以AI赋能个体健康管理，打造以用户为中心的数字健康解决方案
description.en: Ximory is committed to empowering individuals and organizations with AI, creating user-centered digital health solutions

introduction.zh: 心沐智康（杭州）科技有限公司，简称
，成立于2025年，坐落于中国杭州西湖区，是一家专注于人工智能与健康科技融合应用的创新型科技企业。
introduction.en: Ximory (Hangzhou) Technology Co., Ltd., referred to as "Ximory", was established in 2025 and is located in Hangzhou West District. It is an innovative technology enterprise specializing in artificial intelligence and health technology integration applications.

content.zh: 让智慧与心灵共生，赋能每一个生命真实成长。我们相信健康不仅是身体无恙，更是身心灵的和谐共鸣。
content.en: Let wisdom and heart coexist, enabling everyone to live a true growth. We believe that health is not just physical wellness, but also spiritual peace and the joy of shared growth.

points.zh: 科技的终极使命，是让人类更好地自由
points.en: Technology empowers life, making health management more intelligent and convenient

points.zh: 我们的使命不仅是身体无恙，更是身心灵的和谐共鸣
points.en: Wisdom guides the future, creating a healthier and better life

content.zh: 通过先进的人工智能技术，为用户提供精准的健康评估、个性化的健康建议和全方位的健康管理服务，让科技真正服务于人类健康事业。
content.en: Through advanced artificial intelligence technology, we provide users with accurate health assessments, personalized health recommendations, and comprehensive health management services, making technology truly serve human health.

content.zh:
心沐智康诞生于对健康管理现状的深度思考。我们发现，传统的健康管理方式往往缺乏个性化和智能化，无法满足现代人多样化的健康需求。因此，我们汇聚了一群热爱健康事业的技术专家和医疗专业人士，致力于用AI技术重新定义健康管理。

'心沐'寓意着用心呵护，如沐春风；'智康'代表着智慧健康，科技赋能。我们相信，通过技术的力量，可以让每个人都拥有专属的健康管家，享受更加便捷、精准、温暖的健康服务。
content.en:
Ximory was born from deep reflection on the current state of health management. We found that traditional health management methods often lack personalization and intelligence, unable to meet the diverse health needs of modern people. Therefore, we brought together a group of technology experts and medical professionals who are passionate about health, committed to redefining health management with AI technology.

'Xi' means caring with heart, like a spring breeze; 'mory' represents intelligent health, technology empowerment. We believe that through the power of technology, everyone can have their own dedicated health butler, enjoying more convenient, accurate, and warm health services.

description.zh: 以人为本，关注每个个体的真实需求
description.en: Focus on individual needs and care for every individual's true needs

description.zh: 用人工智能技术提升健康管理理念
description.en: Use artificial intelligence technology to enhance health management capabilities

description.zh: 基于科学的医学理论和严谨的数据分析，确保服务的专业性和可靠性
description.en: Based on scientific medical theory and rigorous data analysis, ensuring professional and reliable services

description.zh: 用温暖的科技传递人文关怀，让健康管理充满温度
description.en: Conveying humanistic care through warm technology, making health management full of warmth

time.zh: 周末提供紧急技术支持

description.zh: 用智慧赋能健康，让心灵沐浴科技之光
description.en: Empowering health with intelligence, illuminating hearts with technology

company.zh: 心沐智康（杭州）科技有限公司 版权所有
company.en: Ximory Technology Co., Ltd. All rights reserved.
